svcproc.title: Idle Shutdown Timer (IST)
svcproc.para: The IST feature allows the ECM to shutdown the engine when an extended idle condition occurs. The IST can be programmed for the customer to automatically shut the engine down for idle times that range from 2 to 120 minutes.

The red ENGINE lamp will illuminate before engine shutdown. The lamp will flash for 30 seconds to warn the operator engine shutdown is approaching. Idle time is measured from the last clutch or brake pedal transition. The engine must be out of gear for the IST to work.
For additional information and resets for engine shutdown timer, see "IST System" in Section 7 .
